about.title: What is Propromo?
about.description: "Project Progress Monitoring." Share your project progress with clients. Your client wants to be involved. Propromo makes it possible.

create_monitor.title: Introduction
create_monitor.aside_text: This guide is for Github projects (V2).
create_monitor.aside_link_text: If you want to create a Jira software project monitor, follow this guide.

join_monitor.title: Introduction
join_monitor.main_text: If you want to join a monitor, you need it's monitor_id first. The id is either in form of a link or a long string.
join_monitor.monitor_id_desc: Paste it in the input field at propromo.duckdns.org and hit enter, or press the join button. Alternatively you could join the project at propromo.duckdns.org/monitors/join.
join_monitor.link_desc: Just open the link in your web-browser of choice.
